#summary A list of shortcut keys in AVR Project IDE

===Copy===

 * Ctrl-C

===Cut===

 * Ctrl-X

===Paste===

 * Ctrl-V

===Undo===

 * Ctrl-Z

===Redo===

 * Ctrl-Y

===Find===

 * Ctrl-F

===Replace===

 * Ctrl-H

===Find Next===

 * F3

===Select All===

 * Ctrl-A

===Goto Line Number===

 * Ctrl-G

===Save All Files===

 * Ctrl-S

===Build Project===

 * F7

===Burn Project to Chip===

 * F8
